title: Onee na Kareshi to Boyish Kanojo
original_name: オネエな彼氏とボーイッシュ彼女
sinopse: Tomboy "Nobu" and "Chiyo," a femme man's heartwarming love story. Sometimes things go well, sometimes they don't, and sometimes it's hard to be honest, but as long as they are together they are happy. The everyday lives of the couple and the people that surround them.
